description: "Bound Ball Animals" is a fee-to-play puzzle action game that combines strategic gameplay with adorable animal-themed puzzles, where you pull and launch balls, bouncing them off walls to hit targets.

name: Misaligned
description: Misaligned is a set of 11 vanilla maps for Doom 2 by @myolden and @Ludi, made specifically to feature the MIDIs created by @MtPain27. These maps are short and have low monster counts. The whole set takes about 30 minutes to play.

description: As an Administration A.I. of a deep space probe, you're tasked with scanning and reporting back about a new galaxy. You'll weather cosmic events, witness oddities of the universe, and fly through points of interest to find answers for the base station.

name: Walking Steel
description: Fight epic tank battles, upgrade your vehicles and survive in dangerous conditions. Explore the world, find resources and fight enemies to become the best tanker. Join "Walking Steel" and prove your strength and tactics on the battlefield!

name: Sex In The Block
description: In this exciting game, you explore a luxurious high-rise complex searching for beautiful women to flirt with. Win their hearts with your charm through fun mini-games. As they fall for you, they'll send amazing photos as rewards. Dive into this captivating world and become the ultimate flirt master!

name: IsoCraft Story
description: Isocraft Story is an isometric Minecraft-like sandbox game. Shape the infinite and procedurally-generated block world. Collect materials, play online, advance to higher tiers of tools and weapons, go deeper into the world and build a new spaceship to escape from this planet!

name: Shifter
description: Explore this strange world using portals to shift between the light and dark dimensions. Navigate the world, transforming it as you progress. Illuminate the void to reveal what has been abandoned in the shadows. And remember, don't linger in the darkness...

name: Haunted School: The Presence Behind You
description: Here's an even shorter version, around 150 characters: "Midnight School Terror" Trapped with 7 ghosts. 360° horror forces you to turn. Uncover pasts, make choices. Salt is life. Creepy figures lurk everywhere. Escape or become the 7th spirit?

name: Baguette Wars
description: Dive into the hilarious and intense clashes of Baguettes Wars in Paris, with 40 captivating levels, a unique cartoon style, and a leaderboard to challenge your friends!

name: The Freshman: Book 1
description: A romance story surrounding a young woman who attends a very prestigious college and encounters numerous challenges in life and love as she coasts her way through school.

name: Comet Alpha Rescue
description: Comet Alpha Rescue is a sci-fi 2.5D real-time action/RPG game made in a retro, cartoon style art with comic book-style storytelling, customisable combat abilities allowing for various play styles, detailed character development and progression and interaction with the environment as you explore.

name: Dog vs Cat Othello
description: Cute Growth-Based OthelloA growth-based Othello game featuring cute dog and cat characters. Flip your opponent's character and evolve my character into stronger one! Playable in both single-player and local two-player modes.

name: PokerBall
description: An all new block-based puzzle game, using Poker rules!

name: Match
description: MATCH is a minimalist, arcade-style score-attack game that puts the focus on player skill. Memorize, flip, and match cards as you progress through levels, each with a shorter time limit. Compare your high-scores with friends' in the variety of game modes to see who is the MATCH Master!

With this DLC you'll unlock:

- 13 cool skins for your hand!

Take on new challenges and become a master trickster!
With this DLC you'll unlock:

Equip new skins and trick others with style!

Suit up for Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 5 Season 4: Absolute Doom and become a Marvel legend -

Become the heroes first on the scene to defend against Marvel’s Doctor Doom and his forces or take up the mantle of villainy and join the reign of Doom. Luckily, there's some brand new heavy munitions to take on a worthy adversary. Go head-to-head with new items like Dual Micro SMGs, Captain America’s Shield, or War Machine’s Arsenal.

name: Renovation Simulator
description: Start simple, grow your skills and be the best renovator in the business. Clean, repaint, restyle, and redecorate your way to success. Inside and out.

name: Click on Clocks Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ clocks in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Medium

name: Exo Mayhem
description: Exo Mayhem is the ultimate supervillain experience! Fly, Shoot, Stab, Explode, and Traverse Paradise Mall, a lush multi-biome open world ripe for conquering!

name: Melody's Melon Mania

name: A Pair of Feathers Squawk Together
description: "A Pair Of Feathers Squawk Together" is an easy-to-play, challenging-to-beat platformer inspired by the likes of Jump King and Bread & Fred. Flap the Parrot only has two controls: a right flap, to flap to the right, and a left flap, to flap to the left. As you get higher up the island, you'll encounter new regions with new gimmicks and traps to be wary of. Avoid getting sent back to the ocean down below, and find the treasure at the peak!

name: Creeping Dusk
description: Creeping Dusk is a tower defense game. Build a town around an abandoned gold mine and defend against monsters that swarm the area. Fortify your defenses, and prepare for the increasingly challenging nights. Will you be able to protect your town from the encroaching darkness?

name: Unbodied
description: Unbodied, a small adventure in which you play a skeleton whose body has been stolen. Control your magic wand, solve all the puzzles and find all the spells to finish with the powerful wizard and thus, recover what is yours.

name: Phantom Ten
description:
A horror game to find the anomalies.
You only have to follow a one-way corridor.
There are no items to collect, no puzzles to solve, and no hiding, running, or fighting.

name: Cos-249
description: Welcome to your new job. You will be viewing a recording of COS-249. The test subject's is E-376 he will be recording his full experience in the room.The room is full of anomalous objects and entities. The only objective is to stay alive.But don't worry there is cake at the end.

name: Naribikimura
description: Naribiki Village is a first-person, single-player exploration horror game. The focus is on exploring the uncharted village of Naribiki, where uncovering clues will reveal the truth about what happened there.

name: Cup Killer: Sandbox Game
description: Transform every object into a weapon master the art of warfare and rise to victory in Cup Killer!

name: City Park Play Date
description: City Park Play Date is a kinetic (linear) short story. It is a true AVN, but linear by design, telling a very specific story. You play as James, the protagonist of our story. James is lucky in life, but not in love. Our story explains how that changes for him and opens his eyes to what is possible.

name: Lunar Nightmare
description: Lunar Nightmare is a retro-inspired sci-fi thriller, set on an abandoned Moon base, where you have to solve the mystery behind missing crew members, ancient discoveries around deep down the Lunar surface, rouge-AI trying to control your fate and ghastly androids to revolting against your command.

name: Anomalum
description: You’re trapped in an endless nightmare. Observe your surroundings carefully and check the clock to escape from Anomalum.

name: Underground Turtle Races
description: Are you ready to test your luck in the secret world of turtle racing? The turtles are waiting for you to place your bets and cheer them on. Do you have the confidence to take on the challenge?

name: 100 Hidden Cthulhu Fish 2
description: 100 hidden Cthulhu fish 2 is a hidden objects / clicker game. There are 100 fish hiding on each map. Your task is to find them all

name: 7th Domain
description: "7th Domain" is a horizontal version action game derived from Roguelike Metroidvania combined with treasure grinding gameplay. You will play a child of destiny who repairs the world and finds the truth of the broken world. You will grow in battle and challenge the unknown and hidden forces.

name: Baby Boomer 2: 35 Years Too Soon
description: Sin descripción

name: PeakPals
description: PeakPals offers a multiplayer game where players strive to reach the top, either alone or with friends. The game involves overcoming obstacles, solving puzzles, enduring falls, and engaging in playful acts of sabotage, like throwing grenades at teammates' feet.

name: Netflix Stories: Emily in Paris
description: Say “oui” to possibility. Follow your heart and live out your own story set in the City of Love in this interactive story based on the hit series.

name: The Fast and the Flirtatious: LA Drift
description: “The Fast and the Flirtatious: LA Drift” is a Yuri Dating Sim that delves into the LA underground racing and drifting subculture but also explores the thriving lesbian dating scene that flourishes in this community.

name: House of Golf 2
description: House of Golf 2 delivers an engaging multiplayer golf experience with over 100 unique holes to conquer. Gather up to 4 players for lively couch play sessions, showcasing your skills with jaw-dropping shots. Compete in live tournaments for exciting rewards and leave your mark on the world of golf!

name: Madden NFL 25
description: In EA SPORTS Madden NFL 25, discover the next level of FieldSENSE. This includes a re-engineered physics system, updated features across franchise and other modes as well as brand-new commentary and presentation.

name: Elevator Warp
description: Your goal is simple. Take the elevator to floor 6. But this is no ordinary elevator... Who knows which random floor you'll end up at. A hotel, dungeon, hedge maze, a train? Check the clues on each floor to be able to progress, and achieve the perfect run!

name: Castaway
description: Dive into the short and sweet adventure of Castaway, where the allure of pixel art blends with accessibility for all ages, offering a delightful visual and musical experience, sprinkled with challenges and mysteries waiting to be explored.

name: Mute Crimson DX
description: Mute Crimson DX is an action-packed precision-platformer where you guide Ninja on his quest to climb up walls, slice through bad guys and overcome great evils!

name: Beach Club Simulator 2024
description: Beach Club Simulator is a very comprehensive beach management game. Develop your beach from zero to hero. Increase your earnings, popularity and business acumen. Enjoy the sea, sand and sun!

name: Escortina Life! 2.0
description: Experience 'Jarmo's Road to Redemption,' a compelling adventure game. Help Jarmo collect scattered parts of a classic car, Tord Escortina, and save up to restore it. Traverse the town, solve puzzles, build relationships, and uncover Jarmo's personal growth story.

name: War Of Castles
description: Lead your own soldiers to conquer all castles on the island! Create your own map and challenge players from all over the world! Play online games with friends.

name: BattleTubers
description: The Digital Media Acquisition Creature and his army of CopyWright Creeps have invaded Vtuber worlds! Gather a group of friends and battle as one of your favorite Twitch streamers to defend their homes!

name: Fuyuu
description: A narrative puzzle game that takes place in a small county in China.

name: Regiments: Winds of Change
description: Soar on the winds of change. Navigate the unpredictable war paths of procedurally-generated Operations. Command one of the new French, Dutch, Canadian, or Czechoslovakian regiments as they enter the fray. Experiment with new tactics as heliborne infantry redefine the very shape of the battlefield!

name: Salvo Shuffle
description: Salvo Shuffle is a bullet-hell roguelike that mixes turn-based and action-based combat.

name: With Eyes Closed: Season 1
description: With Eyes Closed - Season 1 is a thriller in the adult visual novel genre. It concentrates on storytelling, realistic characters, and letting players control the development of the story. The game also features plenty of hot scenes that are interwoven into the storyline.

name: Kitchen Quest
description: Become the best chef in the world! Cook more than 50 dishes in your own kitchen with everything a chef needs. And don't forget to make your restaurant nice enough before all the guests leave!

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991
description: This game is a global strategy, which is primarily focused on Ukraine after leaving the Soviet occupation. Here you will be given control of Ukraine with the opportunity to change history and intervene in the events of that time.

name: Pawn Planet
description: You've in charge of managing the pawn shop in this weird galaxy. Make deals with strange customers, flip items, attend auctions and keep the shop going!

name: Feed the Deep
description: A lovecraftian roguelite. Dive into procedurally generated undersea caves. Collect gold, upgrade your equipment, and Feed the Deep.

name: Artifice: War Tactics
description: Artifice: War tactics is a turn-based strategy all about setting up tripwires and executing killer combos! A game of anticipation, deduction and outwitting your enemy at every turn. Play as one of four kingdoms in an epic campaign for territory, champions, relics and the throne of the Immortal king.

name: Jasper and the City of Lights
description: Let me tell you a story my friend. It is the journey of Jasper and a fallen star into the whispering forest to find his sister Nora. In the deepest of shadows an ancient spirit is lurking but there’s hope shining from the horizon: The City of Lights.

name: Yin Yang Space
description: A sandbox FPS game, you can build gardens in the most intuitive and simple way and play with robots.

name: Farewell North
description: Restore color to the desolate islands of Farewell North, an open world journey where you play as a collie traveling with his owner. Explore land and sea, uncover hidden paths, evade monsters, and free wildlife to bring color back to the world while revealing an emotional story about saying farewell.

name: Odd Realm
description: Odd Realm is a simulation game set in a procedurally generated, fantasy world where you foster a group of Settlers to help them build, explore, and survive... probably...

name: Epiko Regal
description:
Epiko Regal is an immersive mobile strategy game that seamlessly blends collectible card gameplay with tower defense battles. Players build and upgrade their decks, which include a wide range of troops, spells, weapons, and buildings, all deployed strategically onto the battlefield. The objective is to defend your towers and engage in dynamic battles against other players to emerge victorious.

As part of the Web3 Gaming Ecosystem, called EPIKO, Epiko Regal offers unique benefits to holders of Epiko NFTs. Players who own these NFTs can claim exclusive in-game rewards, enhancing their gameplay experience. These rewards include rare items, special abilities, and access to exclusive content, helping NFT holders gain a competitive edge in the game.

In addition, Epiko Regal features Mystery Stones—special items that allow players to redeem valuable in-game content like Gems, Gold, higher-level cards, Digital Toys, and chapters from the Kathika Comics. These Mystery Stones can only be unlocked with a redeem code, which players receive when they purchase Epiko NFTs or win them during special events.

Explore the depths of Epiko's universe and unlock exclusive rewards with your Epiko NFTs.

name: Trailmakers: Motorhead Pack
description:
Tires screeching, black-smoke exhaust, and the smell of burned rubber. The Motorhead Pack is made for car, truck, and motorcycle enthusiasts.

Spoiler alert: Lots of new spoilers!

name: Supra Smash Bross Devolution 2.22: You Can (Not) Be Serious
description:
Supra Smash Bross Devolution is a satirical take on the Smash Bros. series, with hilariously terrible graphics yet surprisingly deep gameplay.

A decade-long project, Bross' newest update celebrates its past with a complete remake of its very first iteration included.

To celebrate the 10-year anniversary of the Supra Smash Bross games, a full remake of Supra Smash Bross Mayday is contained within Devolution. It can be accessed via the Vault menu.

name: Variable Geo vs. Asuka 120%
description:
Variable Geo vs. Asuka 120% is a crossover fighting game with characters from Variable Geo and Asuka 120%. Here everything will be standard as in many fighting games, but with differences. For example, some characters from Asuka 120% received new specials and improved supers that differed from the original. Here you will find a couple of mini-games, several additional modes and the ability to play online multiplayer (Network). Have fun in team mode and tag team mode, compete with each other in local or online, practice in training mode and free match. Whatever you want, there are not many modes, but there are enough of them. It is well suited for both tournaments and online gatherings.
Choose your fighter from your favorite fighting series and go to battle!!

name: Punch Monkey
description: You're a broke loner who lives in a crappy apartment. Crime, drugs and alcohol run rampant in your neighborhood. You dream of a better life but it's out of reach. That is, until you see an ad on TV for a big fight with a cash prize! You set out to claim the prize, but you have to make your way through hordes of unsavory crackheads and worthless bums. Are you up to the challenge?

description: Explore a meticulously recreated Europe, delivering cargo across iconic landmarks and diverse landscapes. Master the challenges of the road, manage your virtual trucker's well-being, and customize your rig to become a legend of the European trucking scene!

name: The Great Fleece
description: Oliver and Darran are trying to raid the “Beatrice Auction House”. They need to sneak by some guards and avoid security cameras in order to get a key card to the vault. Can you help them out?

name: Monoch Room
description: After losing consciousness, I found myself in a strange room. An unknown figure guided me deeper into the room. "I thought you would make it this far." Eventually, I saw a past I had forgotten... "monoch room" is an adventure game with puzzle elements.

Show your support and get two unique rollercoaster inspired track pieces for your space railways, plus 40 minutes of additional music and the full soundtrack!

Rollercoaster Railway Pieces
Use the Twist and the Loop to add some rollercoaster flair to your railway lines!

Additional Music
Unlock additional 40 minutes of in-game music from the composer of the original shapez soundtrack, Petter Sumelius, with some tracks by Patrik Pettersson.
Official Soundtrack

The upgrade includes access to the full soundtrack, including the base game music and the additional music for a total of 80 minutes sci-fi inspired electronic music, keeping the essence of the original shapez sound while adding a touch of space to fit the new theme. High quality FLAC versions of every track are included.

description: Join the experiment! Imitation is a brain-teasing guessing game. It pits humans against AI. Given a set of questions, players must choose if the answer was provided by a human or generated by an AI. Can you tell the difference between human and AI?

Discover new gods by spinning the wheel of fortune and go on dates with them, liberating them and undressing them. Add new goddesses to the gallery until you undress them all!

name: Pixeplorer

name: Ninja Rift

Level up your skills, master powerful techniques, and join forces with clans and crews to dominate the battlefield. Challenge other ninjas in intense battles, prove your prowess, and rise to become the ultimate ninja warrior. In Ninja Rift, the path to greatness is paved with strategy, skill, and unwavering determination. Will you conquer the rift and claim your place as the best ninja of all? Join now and begin your adventure!

name: Tiny Whaley 2
description:
Embark on an exciting 2D adventure under the ocean!
In this puzzle platformer game, where we manage a magical and unusual whale,
we not only overcome obstacles by jumping,
but also create our own path by positioning your dead bodies at the right points.
In this adventure you have to prove not only your reflexes and speed but also your strategic and mind skills.
Determine your own strategy, Try to finish the level as fast as possible!

name: ZonZon
description: The main character is a journalist who arrived at a large warehouse to record a documentary about the warehouse operation. But instead, he is faced with a real nightmare. The warehouse turns out to be populated by hungry guards and crazy warehouse operators who turn it into a death trap.

name: Mages of Osmea
description: Mages of Osmea is a top down spellslinging RPG where you create your own spells to defeat corrupted monsters. Fight through waves of monsters and bosses, completing objectives in singleplayer or with friends.

name: Seoul Station
description: This game is a “Find the Difference” game set in the Korean subway system. At the start, you will board the normal 0th train. Once you move to the 1st train, the real adventure begins. From the 1st train onward, you need to find differences from the 0th train.

name: Laser Circle
description: Laser Circle - A 2D pixel top-down shooter game where you play as a spherical blob that destroys enemies with weapons that become more powerful with each level, while the blob itself also gets stronger.

name: Frontline Crisis
description: This is a top-down shooter with tower defense elements‘ set during the great war between insects and humans.

name: Block Bot: Puzzle Journey
description: BlockBot: Shape-shifting puzzle adventure in a vibrant pixel world. Transform, solve, explore. Each level unlocks new potential. Perfect for quick plays or long sessions, offering unique challenges every time you dive in.

name: Bloody Sky
description: This is a game where you defeat three bosses. The hero's challenge continues until all the bosses are defeated.

name: Dawn of Survivor
description: A third-person survivor roguelike game where waves of zombies come at you. By killing them, you get random opportunities to acquire equipment, weapons, and new skills. You can have up to 8 skills, giving you immense power. Come and see how far you can go!

name: Scaler
description: Scaler is a 3d platformer adventure with unique mechanic that allows you to fully control your size/scale (i.e., to shrink and to grow). Use this ability to explore the game space and find a way to close the rift spheres that are metastasizing into our world.

name: Arcade Tanks World: Tank Battle Simulator
description: Welcome to the arcade world of battle tanks! Get into the tank, go to the battlefield and complete all combat missions!

name: Amazing Drawing: Coloring Book Simulator
description: You are immersed in a world of creativity and self-expression, where everyone can become a real artist in the colouring book simulator!

name: 3D Puzzle: Bedroom
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: GuiGui
description: GuiGui is a clicker game where you click on a cute character named GuiGui! In GuiGui, every click brings you closer to collecting more adorable GuiGui characters and items! Every 3 and 18 hours, you get a random character item from the GuiGui universe.

name: Ouija Escape VR
description: BEWARE THE EVIL THAT IS OUIJA. now you must escape the evil and save your soul before its to late. experience the scares and the dark truth behind what happened. each question you ask the board, you might not like the answers can you survive the terror.

name: Boxed In
description: In a voxel-based world, you control a ball that moves in the direction you choose until it encounters a wall or obstacle. Navigate through intricate levels filled with challenging hazards and features.

name: Home Snatch
description: As night falls, you are alone at home and experience strange events that reveal an evil entity. Survive the night in a desperate struggle with your worst nightmares. In this four-chapter journey, every shadow hides peril, and every noise could spell your demise.

name: Dropped into the Modern World: Surviving the Red-Light District
description: After an attack by a monster, the sorceress Daiya suddenly gets teleported to modern-world Kabukicho! Without a home and all alone, she gets offered shelter by a person named XiaoHong. With their help, Daiya is able to start a new life, but can she return to her home world…?

name: The Sunday
description: The Sunday is a short walkthrough horror game where the idea of being alone will hunt you, until the drakness settles in your brain. The line between reality and nightmare is razor thin.

name: Project Heck
description: This is a casual and entertaining typing game that lets you experience the thrill of hacking systems by rapidly typing on your keyboard. Whether stress-testing your keyboard or unwinding after a tough day, this game has got you covered!

name: Kitchen Trials: Rush
description: Return to the kitchen as fast as possible using your chef's knife on a chain to whip through living vegetables to pass your first trial in this kitchen-themed 2D platformer. Obtain all the stars with the fastest times to surpass the other competitors! How fast will you rush back to the kitchen?

name: Mother Bunker VR
description:
Embark on a Post-Apocalyptic Virtual Reality Adventure Like No Other!
Welcome to Mother Bunker, an open-world, post-apocalyptic zombie first-person shooter (FPS) that combines intense survival with a touch of humor. This single-player VR game, crafted for ages 16+, will challenge your decision-making, resource management, and combat skills in a beautifully designed low-poly world.

name: Ether
description: Help a Space Mercenary, Ether, complete a difficult scavenging mission in an abandoned ship. Explore 4 different biomes, each with its share of dangers, and escape a swarm of mutant space bugs.

name: Femdom Farm
description: Feel yourself as a pathetic slave at Femdom Farm whose sole purpose is to serve the dominant Mistresses!

name: Sperm Into Labia
description: Anaïs, a porn influencer, plunges into a whirlwind of sensations that defy her understanding and awaken her deepest anxieties. Unable to escape the clutches of her agoraphobia, insomnia becomes her constant companion, fueling her relentless pursuit of carnal satisfaction.

name: The Well of Heaven-Reaching
description: the Well of Heaven-reaching is a platforming game. Choose from a variety of jumps where you'll need to make your way through traps and obstacles to reach the top of the Well of Heaven-reaching.

name: Tactical Strike: Special Forces Shooter
description: Your mission is to eliminate enemies, free hostages and defuse bombs to ensure safety and peace in an exciting first-person shooter!

name: Katawa Shoujo
description: A censored Steam release of the romantic visual novel set in the fictional Japanese Yamaku High School for disabled children. Hisao's congenital heart defect forces him to move to a new school. Despite his difficulties, Hisao is able to find friends—and perhaps love, if he plays his cards right.

name: Taking the Cross
description: Taking the Cross allows you to control Christian Armies fighting for the holy land, inflict crushing defeats on your enemies and win glory for the faith!

name: Idol Party
description:
“WOW,you can really dance!” Welcome to IDOL PARTY. Immerse yourself in dance and song to find friends in this social game. Charm your love with moves and melodies, pledge togetherness, marry, and start a family. Tired? Farm or play mini-games for endless fun!

"Idol Party" is a music game with a lively style using the concept of idols!
Gorgeous costumes, personalized mounts, massive music songs, everything you want is here.

name: Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D
description: Are you ready to build your fishing supermarket empire?

name: Dwelling
description: In "Dwelling," a police officer investigates terrifying events in an abandoned school. Uncover the truth, survive the horrors, and solve the mystery hidden within each floor.

name: Dawn of Defiance
description: You are the Defier, subjected to a mythic plot across ruined isles. In this Greek myth-inspired survival craft, ascend from weak soldier to god-like anti-hero. Build impressive Greek structures, craft and upgrade your gear, and face down the trials of Gods with up to 3 friends.

name: Dredge: The Iron Rig
description: Gather, craft and deliver your way through the mysteries of The Iron Rig, revisiting areas from DREDGE to investigate ancient disturbances stirring in the deep. Assist the Ironhaven Corporation in constructing facilities that unlock items, gadgets and more, but what are they truly here for?

name: Fear Calibration
description: Who are you? What time is it? How long have you been in this place? In this horror-puzzle escape room, uncover the dark secrets hidden within the shadows as you solve your way through the empty classrooms of your school–or what seems to be of it. Do you really think you can escape this madness?

name: Second Room
description: You are a horror video contributor. You are going to play “Hitori Hide-and-Seek” for 7 days in a haunted place called “The Second Room” to film bizarre phenomena. You have to collect all the dolls while avoiding the bizarre phenomena and complete the ritual of “Hitori Hide-and-Seek” safely.

name: Harvest Hustlers
description: Harvest hustlers is a chaotic couch co-op farming game for one to four players. Working together, you and your fellow farmers must grow vegetables, feed animals, cook and serve orders to the demanding farmers market visitors before they leave in anger.

name: Capslock
description:
Capslock is a casual game focused on design and testing your imagination. Choose between 100 skins, 195+ custom keys, 220+ symbols and more (so far) to test your designs and make unique keyboards. Relax as you listen to the 'clicky' sounds, chosen to help you unwind and immerse into a keyboard building environment.

Start from scratch - solve the puzzle of dragging and dropping each key into its' slot to build out your keyboard, or dive straight into designing and auto-fill all your keys with the press of a button! You can edit one key at a time, or make changes to your whole board - we hope Capslock moves at a pace which suits you.

name: Mach K9
description: A physics, wave based roguelite where you smash aliens out of arena to defeat them and choose upgrades between waves.

name: Planetaries
description: A sci-fi open world survival adventure. Set in a time when humanity has expanded its reach beyond the confines of Earth, immerse yourself in a rich galaxy. Craft, build, mine, trade, explore, and fight your way through a universe brimming with endless possibilities.

name: Reach the Beat
description: Dive into the stunning world of "Reach The Beat," where your shooting skills are tested to the electrifying rhythms of electronic music. In this game, every move and shot you make creates a musical harmony, illuminated by the neon lights of an abstract city. Ready to feel the rhythm?

name: Spirit Harem
description: An erotic visual novel about sexy spirit girls!

name: Strangling a Snake Tale
description: The mighty and very rude humans heroes set out into the deep lizard hinterland to find the missing princess. Will the humans courage withstand the machinations of extraterrestrial tyrants and their minions? Immerse yourself in the world of Hyperborea and make fateful decisions in a new visual novel!

name: Kalpa: Cosmic Symphony
description: Kalpa, the authentic mobile 5-key rhythm game, is now available on STEAM! The doomed universe needs you to play your life away. Play your life's music with Kalpa to save the dying Yggdrasil and revive the universe!

name: Loot Goblins
description: Step into Loot Goblins, a chaotic realm of greed and gas. Snatch treasures before rivals do, but watch out for their tricks and gassy surprises! Experience an exhilarating frenzy like no other!

name: Galaxy Too Far
description: Another world is about to become a resource colony for your Creator. Prove your usefulness. Spread your influence across the planet. Take all resources you can reach, build a logistic web to bring them into your world. You will be rewarded and given the opportunity to consume this world entirely.

name: Red Silhouette
description: 2.5D survival horror game, where Eevi works security at the abandoned Silver Leaf Mall known to contain doors to many dead dreams.

name: Prisoners
description: An online game in which players (2-10) sentenced to death try to win their freedom and the grand prize by eliminating others.

name: EternAlgoRhythm
description: A 10-key rhythm game where both the notes you hear and the notes you play are procedurally generated. Tap and hold notes through eternal, ever-changing melodies!

name: Dark Lord
description: Unleash your power in Dark Lord, a roguelike RPG filled with strategy, adventure, and sardonic wit. Rule your growing realm with an iron fist, fortify the stronghold, and avoid getting stabbed in the back by your advisors!

name: Intravenous 2
description: Intravenous 2 is the ultimate blend of tactical gameplay and immersive storytelling. Will you embrace the shadows or confront your foes head-on? The choice is yours. Experience a new era of tactical stealth action. Save lives. Uncover secrets. Take vengeance.

name: Card Crafter Genesis
description: Card Crafter Genesis- Create your own card games with custom cards, decks, and rulesets! Then play them against other players online! Each card can be given custom backs, fronts, descriptions, and effects!

name: Just Crow Things
description: Play as a cute crow, fly around town, poop on people, and steal their shiny trinkets! In this sandbox-y adventure game, help your animal friends create adorable chaos and have a beak-tastic time customizing your adorable crow appearance! Why? Just caws!

name: Block & Shot
description: Block & Shot will immerse you in the captivating world of logical puzzles, where you will have to control various weapons to overcome obstacles in your path and reach the main goal - the golden cartridge

name: Arco
description:
Three tales forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.

Enter the breathtakingly beautiful world of Arco, a unique tactical action game where your decisions shape the story. Journey through lush forests, sweeping plains, and scorching deserts as you guide four unlikely heroes in their vendetta against the Red Company gang.

Battle warriors of different nations, fend off greedy colonizers, and slay monstrous creatures as you voyage across this enchanted land. Change your fate, one move at a time.

name: Bashtronaut
description: Suit up, Bashtronaut, there’s been another invasion! Grab the nearest blunted weapon you can find and clock into this hack-and-bash adventure where you play as a seemingly ordinary exterminator in an extraordinary setting.

name: Phantom Spark
description: Dive into the captivating high-speed world of Phantom Spark. Engage in precision time-trial racing to best the champions in the single-player campaign, challenge your friends in split-screen local multiplayer, or make your mark on the global online leaderboards.

name: Cyborg3003
description: 6-player co-op survival horror at its finest with cyborgs, monsters, and aliens.

name: Play Chess with Lady Bongcloud
description: "Play Chess with Lady Bongcloud" is an unique chess game that allows you to engage in thrilling chess matches with the Lady Bongcloud. The lady hails from the noble Bongcloud family, renowned for their unique "Bongcloud Opening".

name: Tales & Tactics
description: Roguelike Squad-based Autobattler in a Tabletop RPG setting. Draft your army, carefully equip and position your units, make important choices, and meet a colorful cast of characters as you make ready for the Grand Tournament.

name: Toroidal: Awaiting the Spring
description: Sin descripción

name: Ringlorn Saga Gaiden
description: Ringlorn Saga Gaiden is an adventure RPG inspired by the Japanese PC classics. After dying in a decisive battle, your spirit is separated from your body, and you must exact your revenge on the Dark Lord by possessing his minions.

name: God's Gift
description: God's Gift is a 2D puzzle platformer inspired by Lemmings and Pikmin with an emphasis on forward planning, exploration and experimentation. Guide mindless cultists throughout 24 levels overcoming environmental and enemy based puzzles by mutating the cultists giving them fantastic eldritch abilities.

name: Last Order
description: Last Order is a 2D action game with pixel art style. To recover the "Last Order" in devastated world, you'll use a variety of wire actions.

name: Gourdlets
description: An easygoing sandbox game about building towns for cute vegetable folks. Create your perfect community then watch as the gourdlets make themselves at home. No objectives, no points, just good vibes. Play in full screen, or let your gourdlets hang out at the bottom of your screen!

name: Shapez 2
description: Dive into a factory-building game where the focus is on just that — building huge factories! Construct sprawling multi-level factories and min-max your layouts without limits. Shapez 2 is tailor-made for enthusiasts who crave the thrill of optimizing production lines and perfecting automation.

name: Murder Next Room
description: Murder Next Room is a multiplayer role-playing game. You are trapped in a location with others and one or more of them are killers. The police has been called and in the mean time try to survive. You can try to report the killer but there is no guarantee that the phones will be working.

name: Overboss
description:
Become a villain in this retro-inspired board game. Draft terrain tiles, recruit monsters, build your map, and become the OVERBOSS!

Step into the shoes of 12 iconic bosses from the renowned board game Overboss, who want to attain supreme power by building their kingdom. The value of your dominion hinges on the arrangement of terrain tiles and the strategic placement of your monstrous minions. Each tile type and its positioning can either bolster or hinder your ascent to dominance.

name: Bring It On!
description: Bring It On! is a single-player auto-attacking 'monster'-hell shoot-em-up survival game. Take on massive hordes of monsters across several locations, earning experience points to level up and acquire new weapons and items.

name: Oddada
description: A tiny musical world, where houses sing, machines drum, and you create music with them. Ob-la-di, Ob-la-da, Oddada!

name: Cricket: Jae's Really Peculiar Game
description:
Cricket: Jae's Really Peculiar Game is a cute, funny, and heartwarming hand animated JRPG from Studio Kumiho.

After a devastating loss, Jae would do anything to fix the past. Blast off with your newfound friends on a journey to the gates of Yimmelia, a fabled land on the moon that’s rumored to grant any wish.

You take turns fighting, landing timed inputs, and using the benefits from those attacks to do awesome team attacks. Your behavior in the world affects the difficulty of combat, and the rewards. The story focuses on laughs while also having real moments about loss, loneliness, and friendship.

name: The Crimson Diamond
description:
"The Crimson Diamond is a text-parser EGA mystery adventure game by indie game developer Julia Minamata.

The Crimson Diamond is inspired by classic adventure games of the late 80s and early 90s, particularly Sierra On-line's The Colonel's Bequest. Explore Crimson Lodge and its environs! Eavesdrop on intriguing characters! Solve mysteries!"

"The Crimson Diamond is a text parser mystery adventure game where you play as amateur geologist and reluctant detective Nancy Maple. Follow Nancy as she travels north to the fictional ghost town of Crimson, Ontario to investigate the discovery of a massive diamond in the area. Eavesdrop on conversations to learn more about the eccentric cast of characters who find themselves gathered at Crimson Lodge. Explore the lodge and its environs to evaluate the diamond claim, and maybe solve a mystery or two along the way! The Crimson Diamond is a cozy mystery that encourages reading and engaging in the story over devious arcade challenges."

name: Sapo 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainwreck
description: Trainwreck is a nonlinear visual novel where your choices will have a significant impact on the story. Navigate it wisely, as their lives are in your hands.

name: RetroTime
description:
RetroTime for vircon32 is a game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes being Retro Carousel, Time Attack and Lives mode. The game is a port from the Playdate version which was a port from the SDL2 version from my competition entry for Fuze 4 for Nintendo switch, in collaboration with Wireframe magazine.

There are the 8 retro based games implemented in this game:
- Invaders
- Brick Breaker
- Toady
- Snakey
- Bubble Buster
- Block Stacker
- Color Invasion
- Faster Dave

name: Transylmania Deluxe: SAGE 2024 Edition
description:
Sneak into the Bubble Gum Factory with the new Bubble Gum Run mode!
This is a special version of Transylmania Deluxe made for SAGE 2024!

Your castle has been invaded by pesky villagers! To save yourself (and to get some rest) jump on top of their heads or run into them from behind and turn them into the walking dead!
To get to the next level, open your coffin by snagging all of the villagers, and get in before the sun rises!
Watch out for fire, water, sunlight and spikes!

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.1 - Undercover R&B
description: Zenless Zone Zero 1.1 released on August 14, 2024, adding more story content, new characters and a bunch of changes to the base game. Including new game-play content and balance changes.

name: Zodiac Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Bards College Expansion
description: A mod for Skyrim Creations that greatly expands the Bards College with a brand new main questline, new side quests, mini-games, shouts, abilities, skill system, weapons, and more to help you become a Bard!

name: Animal Zoo: The Forgotten Land
description: Dive into this exciting visual novel. Join Luna, the wise owl, and Max, the brave tiger, along with their friends: Roco the mouse, Pepe the penguin, and Nina the giraffe.

name: Arcade Archives: Knuckle Heads
description: Serious competition is here.

name: Alphabet
description: Alphabet is an exciting clicker that will immerse you in the world of letters and words. In this game you can get letters of different rarity for the time spent in the game. Collect letters, discover new words and use them to create unique items.

name: Burger Kombat
description: Assemble your most expensive burger from whatever you can find in the kitchen.

name: Sam & Max: The Complete Trilogy
description: What's better than one Sam & Max season? Three Sam & Max seasons!

name: Star Light Dynamics
description: Star Light Dynamics is a doomII boom wad comprised of 5 (plus a credits map) science fiction themed maps

name: Derma
description: Short horror RPG

name: Idle Champions: Masquerade Ball Ellywick Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Ellywick (if you don't already have them) Masquerade Ball Ellywick Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Ellywick 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Ellywick Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Marine Quest
description: Simple turn-based RPG where you make your way across different marine-based landscapes, fighting several harmful species or objects in a quest to save the ocean.

name: Pantsu!
description: Experience the ultimate thrill of a 2D side-scrolling endless runner game, controlling your character to jump, dodge obstacles, challenge yourself for higher scores, and enjoy relaxing background music.

name: Idle Champions: Masquerade Ball Lae'zel Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Lae'zel (if you don't already own them) Masquerade Ball Lae'zel Skin An Epic Feat for Lae'zel 7 Gold Lae'zel Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Fishlets: Natural Decor Pack
description: Customize your tanks with 14 nature-themed decor objects in the Fishlets - Natural Decor DLC Pack! Create a blackwater haven using the leaf litter and cholla wood, add some beauty and serenity with the flowing bonsai trees, or decorate your marine tanks with shiny sea glass and seashells.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Defective Pack
description: The Defective class, the Cobold species, and the Dominion Species.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Aves Pack
description: The Aves pack. which features all of the birds, and flying creatures of Elusia.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Cleric Pack
description: The cleri clcass, The Angel species, and the Soul species.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Antique Pack
description: The Antique Class, The Kitsune and Fluffle Species!

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Desecrator Pack
description: The Desecrator class, The Eldrian and Defiled species~

name: Quack Jump
description:
Jump! Yes, every time you jump there is an action and you activate the puzzles,
Get the key and pass the levels by timing the puzzles correctly with good timing!

name: Tetris Crush
description: A game of Tetris played with guns.

name: Arderico's Journey
description: Arderico's Journey is an interactive fiction adventure that draws inspiration from the fascinating realms of fantasy tabletop RPGs and classic gamebooks, enriched with dynamic character interactions, meaningful choices, and content that reacts to your decisions.

name: Astral Ascent: Yamat - The Breach Traveler
description: Sin descripción

name: Not A Banana: Capybara
description: Hello! Welcome to the wonderful world of capybara clicker! Here you will become a true friend of the capybaras, clicking on the screen and calling the cutest and sometimes special capybaras! Don't forget to keep clicking to attract even more capybaras to you!

name: Wonder Loop Village
description: You’ve wandered into a mysterious village. Let’s search for anomalies and aim for the exit!

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Ireland
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Ireland landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: When You See It
description: Search for 5 creatures across real photos in this hidden object horror game. Look closely at each image. If you see the creature, press spacebar before the camera changes. But be careful, if your face is too close to the screen, the jumpscares will be worse.

name: Line Change
description: Line Change - A 2D pixel side-view game where you draw lines that become bridges from one point to another, allowing three creations to make their way to the finish.

name: Rerodent
description: Rerodent is a first-person psychological horror and puzzle game about rats and cultists. You play as Jimmy Rodentim, and one day you get a call from your uncle Vic, who asks you to clean up his house for 100 bucks. Little did you know that a simple task will get you killed.

name: Steel Heart
description: Steel Heart is a first-person horror mech game where you have to manage the mech's resources and fend off the dangers that lie on the alien planet that constantly rains steel... One mech. One Planet. One promise of freedom.

name: Heat Plan
description: Heat Plan is a strategy roguelike game about unit placement. Make good use of randomly appearing units and buffs, and strategically place your units within the limited grid spaces on the board to earn more coins and achieve the set goal.

name: A Room You Can't Exit Unless You Find the Numbers
description: You have been trapped in a room you can't exit unless you find the numbers. Let's find the numbers inside the room and escape.

name: Ice Cream Wars
description: A madcap arcade driving game in the unexpectedly cut-throat world of the frozen confectionary distribution industry. Race against the clock (and Gelatoni's henchmen) to provide the residents of Rippleton with the sweet frozen treats they're craving.

name: RotorScape
description: RotorScape is a shoot 'em up style game with a 2.5D perspective, where you fly a helicopter. You can collect different weapons to use in combat. The game has stages with different themes and climates, as well as threatening bosses. RotorScape proposes a 90s style of gameplay.

name: The Concentration of Lust
description: Become the Master of All Spells, who unexpectedly discovers uninvited female guests in his tower. Battle mysterious women in a strategic casual Point & Click minigame and uncover dark secrets. Immerse yourself in magical fantasy and master both magic and passion.

name: ZombiGon
description: Pick up any weapons you have. Then deal with the zombies that are intent on eating you. We provide you with lots of weapons and ammunition. Eh! But we're not sure. If this is enough for you to survive in "ZombiGON"

name: Pub Sim
description: You've just bought your first Pub. First steps are to clean it, stock it, set your markup and let in the Patrons. Keep the drinks flowing and try not to shortchange anyone! If you keep it going long enough you might just earn enough to spruce up the place, hire staff and expand the premises.

name: Tritime Space
description: A stand-alone monster-killing game that performs action strikes and releases cool skills according to the beat of music: -- You can sense energy from the rhythm, and the energy will be transformed into stronger power!

name: Best Gun
description: Best Gun is a light-hearted arcade flight action game featuring both single-player and multiplayer content. Fly (or walk) and take part in fights, mini-games, races, and more.

name: The Last Hollow
description: Step into the mysterious world filled with secrets, puzzles, and challenging paths. Embrace your destiny as the chosen hollow from a forgotten dark land to save dark hollows waiting for salvation.

name: Fantasy Valley: Season 1
description: Fantasy Valley is a visual novel. The player have choice to talk with characters, and explore objects. The story is linear with moments of exploration sprinkled in. Occasional dialogue options give player a chance to express their personality but these choices will not affect how the story pans out.

name: Targeted: -10 Days
description: Can you survive 10 days in this anomaly-finding game? Stay vigilant, because YOU ARE THE TARGET!

name: Floors
description: Embark on a procedural liminal journey filled with eerie, unfriendly faces. Walk, explore, and descend to the first floor to escape. No monsters will chase you, but they can watch and appear when you aren't looking. This can evoke a fear of an endless labyrinth and create a sense of anxiety.

name: Axe Ace
description: Sin descripción

name: Kaerimichi
description: An unreal horror adventure where you just go home without looking back.

name: Save the Knight
description: 拯救骑士 is a 2D horizontal panel pixel puzzle game where players take on the role of a female hero to challenge various powerful enemies and save the knight.

name: Tiny Pixels Vol. 1: Ninpo Blast
description: Jump on your hoverbike and blast off for unlimited ninja-themed bullet hell mayhem!

name: Project Evolve
description: Take control of Azula in this action-packed beat-em-up adventure game, where you will recover your abilities as you progress through the simulation. Use close combat attacks and powerful electrical strikes to defeat your enemies and reach the end!

name: Kokoronull
description: "Kokoronull" is a hardcore action game that adds the element of "slipperiness" to the usual platform action gameplay. Conquering all 25 stages is an impressive achievement.

name: Banishing You
description: Banishing You will transport you into a realm of dreams and imaginations. Summoned by four alluring strangers you will have to deal with passive aggressive comments, a grand quest to help the inhabitants of that realm and maybe the end of the world.

name: Desvelado
description: Turn off the lights, dodge the ghosts and go to sleep as soon as you can in this hand-crafted 2d platform experience! In this vampiric precision platformer you will overcome challenging puzzles and deadly enemies before going to sleep in your cosy coffin.

name: Unlock the Three
description: Unlock the Three is about a Police,Medic,Security Worker and a Father trying to escape from a monster in locked hospital. Monster is also controlled by a player and each survivor has its own unique skills to perform.Survivors must be collaborate with each other to be able to escape.

name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse
description: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse is the conclusion of the Telltale's episodic Sam & Max trilogy, remastered by members of the original dev team and brought back to life for modern systems.

name: Aleph
description: Aleph is a first-person puzzle stealth game in which you must use the power of light manipulation to help the world relearn a dead language.

name: Dimensions
description: In the Multiverse everything is possible, so each level is another world, another universe, live this incredible adventure and at the same time go through the history of video games.

name: Lost to Riches
description: Fight your way through an army of demons in order to escape a cursed casino, using a variety of powerful items, weapons and holier than thou upgrades in this Rogue-Lite experience!

name: Hellbreach: Vegas
description:
Hellbreach: Vegas is a Wave-based First-Person Shooter for 1-4 players, made with passion by a one man dev team!

Set your loadout, kill, and earn cash. Take a spin on the various slot machines and level up to improve your survival chances.

Are you ready to try your luck?

name: Love, Ghostie
description: Become a wholesome ghost matchmaker and grow relationships between the manor’s residents! Gift items to lift their spirits, set them up on dates, and watch love bloom! Discover cute romances with a unique story between every pair of residents! How will love blossom in your manor?

name: Crime Scene Cleaner
description: Once you get tangled with the mob, you will forever be a part of the mob. At least they pay a decent salary and all you have to do is clean up after their dirty work, but you know what you’re doing. So clean crime scenes, outsmart the police and get ready for the next mission.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Unmarked Police Vehicle Pack
description: Want to conceal your police identity and go undercover? Add a selection of 9 exclusive unmarked police vehicles with 5 different looks to your fleet.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Special Police Vehicle Pack
description: Extend your department's roster of police vehicles with 9 patrol cars with 5 new skin sets, including black/white, white/blue, black/yellow, and white/gold paint jobs.

name: Trainz 2019: Model Trainz - Germany
description: Model Trainz: Germany is a German themed model railway route with several inspirations from different parts of Germany and a few from the classical routes from UTC. The route takes place in the valley of the mountains and in the mountains.

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - CSX Loco Bundle 1
description: Start your CSX railroad experience with these five locos in your shed featuring shunting and long range duties. These detailed locomotives comes with a variety of features like fuel consuming, weathering skins or animated cabin controls.

name: Primal Passions: Isekai Love
description: Sin descripción

name: Cybermatrix
description: CYBERMATRIX is a game about speed and movement. A difficult and exciting adventure awaits you, which you will have to pass using one multifunctional knife and many different abilities. But the further you go, the more different techniques you will discover, and the stronger your opponents will be.

name: Drag Racing Professionals: Dirt Mechanic Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in the world of adrenaline, speed, and drag racing mechanics on the quarter-mile with "Drag Racing Professionals: Dirt Mechanic Simulator." Become a master of drag racing, working in the atmosphere of gritty tracks and thrilling competitions.

name: The Little Mermaid: Wonder Puzzles
description: With over 100 images and three game modes, it's perfect for kids and juniors. Have fun solving all the puzzles. Ideal for little explorers!

name: Nodebuster
description: Nodebuster is a short, experimental incremental game about busting nodes and destroying reality.

name: Rip Connections
description: Rip Connections is a SiIvaGunner inspired version based on Connections by The New York Times. The game showcases various rips from the channel and the player is tasked to sort them into 4 groups. Examples for these groups include a common source between rips, event day or theme of game ripped.

name: Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains
description: Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains is a JRPG-styled game which focuses on story-telling, exploration and turn-based battling. Each main character has its own mysterious story. Furthermore, the game has a unique atmosphere which absolutely makes it a different experience in comparison to other JRPG games.

name: Canto I
description: Face the Dark Forest of the Divine Comedy in this action platformer inspired by the Sommo Poeta’s masterpiece! Help Dante avoid pitfalls, spikes & specters using double jumps, magical attacks and dashes. Find the scrolls containing the triplets of the Canto exploring this gloomy, pixelart forest!

name: Black Bird
description: It is a dynamic pixel style shooting game that focuses on fast-paced survival challenges and intense battles against endless zombie waves. The game adopts retro pixel art design, with full color graphics and strong visual impact.

name: Hook-a-Duck VR
description: Exactly what it says on the tin; Hook-a-duck, in VR! ...except some of the ducks have outboard motors, and can actually "fly".

name: Necrosphere64
description: A 64×64 Metroidvania with only 2 buttons (neither of them jumps)

name: Sisyphos
description: Sisyphos is a cruel game inspired by the Greek myth, the Albert Camus’ book “The Myth of Sisyphus”. It pays homage to “Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy”. All you have is a hand, a rock, and the slope of a mountain. With practice, you’ll roll the rock uphill to the...

name: Spellarium 11
description: Play Match3 Puzzle and return the dying world back to life!

name: Black Hole Survivor
description: A physics based twin-stick shooter about surviving as long as possible and getting a high score. Use your gravity beam or your gravity mine to destroy endless waves of enemies situated around a black hole.

name: High Impact
description: First Person Shooter with very detailed worlds. It includes Platforming and rooms with Puzzles that you need to solve in order to advance.

name: Invasion of the Mushroom Men of Planet Y!
description: This is a quick, goofy game that lasts about ten minutes per play through-unless you choose wrongly-organ music, please! In addition to your choices, there is also the random element of chance that may affect your fate. Due to the constraints of the game engine, can only be viewed in windows mode.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in India
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the India landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Drop Cooking
description: Drop Foods into the Pot and Cook the Dishes! In this exciting game, drop foods into the pot and create delicious dishes! When the necessary foods for a recipe come into contact, they attach together, and when all the required foods are combined, the dish is complete.

name: Bus Simulator 2024: City Driver - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Catgirl Aim Trainer
description: Train your aim with a beautiful selection of Catgirls! Shoot the Catgirls with various weapons, and have a fun time while practicing!

name: Project Unknown Designation
description: Meet your friends at their cabin in the woods. What lies ahead?

name: Ops
description: Created by real life VLA Operators, "Ops" takes you inside the shadowy world of NRAO Special Operations and puts you at the controls of the world's largest energy weapon: the Karl Zjunior Very Lethal Array!

name: Fushigi na Sekai no Kankou Nikki
description: This game is finding them and trying to clear the game. I can't give away any secrets, so I can't give you any detailed explanations. You'll just have to buy it! Tom: "But it's only available in Japanese language. Is there no English version?" "sorry. then I took an arrow in the knee... "

name: Kiborg: Arena
description: Fight for cash and glory in a prison planet’s Coliseum in this free prologue to KIBORG, the fast-paced action rogue-lite with brutal, cybernetic-enhanced combat.

name: Memento Mori
description: A game for the ones we lost on the way. Memento Mori is a surreal walking simulator that combines a minimalistic art style and a show, don't tell story focused on dealing with loss.

name: Where Is My Cat
description: "Where is My Cat" is a horror shooter game where you play as a janitor in an abandoned medical school and spend your days looking for your missing cat.

name: Silk Suki: Chat Messaging Game
description: Spend a night with Suki! Chat with Suki, complete missions, unlock poses, and fully undress her! 16 kawaii poses to unlock, and all clothing can be removed! Try out the free demo.

name: Guayota
description: Unveil the darkest secrets of Saint Brendan’s Island, the paradise on Earth, in this 3D Puzzle-Adventure game. Only equipped with a torch, walk through ancient gods’ temples and solve their enigmas.

name: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery
description: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery is a cozy hidden object game that has you searching for hidden objects in hand-drawn, interactive landscapes. Ignite your imagination, unleash your inner artist with the editor and share your masterpieces with the world!

name: Tavern Manager Simulator
description: Restore your fantasy tavern to its full glory. Repair, improve and expand the establishment. Cook delicious food and keep an eye on the mood of the visitors. Create a unique atmosphere for unforgettable adventures!

name: Beats of Betrayal
description: Beats of Betrayal is an adventure game with roguelike mechanics and rhythm-based combat. Explore dungeons, gain skills and grow stronger to defeat challenging bosses and unlock the secrets surrounding the 'Power of the Waves'!

name: Fruit Slice by Motion Capture
description: This is a very classic fruit cutting game, but it is not controlled by a mouse or touch. Instead, it uses a camera to capture the trajectory of your arm and control the knife light to cut through the fruit . So,You only need a regular camera to experience the joy of real-time motion capture games.

name: Dark and Deep
description: A conspiracy podcast drags you into a world of mystery and terror. Reveal secrets and horrors with mystical frames given to you by a strange observer. Dark and Deep is a first-person cosmic horror game with a focus on puzzles and exploration.

name: Adrenaline Rampage
description: Adrenaline Ramage is a shoot’em up survival game based on dodge and run and platformer mechanics with roguelite elements. Hit and run!

name: Chrono Commando 2053
description: "Chrono Commando 2053" offers an exciting gaming experience that combines time travel and military action. Led by Ömer Halis, a special unit ventures through the depths of time to fight for the salvation of humanity. Players witness pivotal moments in history and wield the power to manipulate history to save the world.

name: Demonsomnia
description: Demonsomnia is a CO-OP horror video game developed and published by Woziva on Steam. It is a 4-player online CO-OP horror game about the impact of post-nuclear reaction. Radiation spread all over, put on your gas mask and go to the forest, collect the objects, and return to the mansion. Your goal is to gather evidence with equipment and hunt down the ghost.

name: Wild Americas
description: Lose yourself in the lush forests of Mountain Island. Wild Americas is a 3rd person top-down exploratory, survival-adventure game fused with action and RPG elements that takes players on a journey from the highest mountain peaks to the depths of abandoned mining tunnels.

name: To the Stars
description: Explore a strange galaxy, recruit funky aliens and discover weird worlds! Fight off hostile warships in exciting and easy-to-understand space combat! Most importantly, give your flock of gullible tourists the space tour of a lifetime…

name: Missing Mildred
description: A 2D platformer game with puzzle elements in a retro NES/SNES style. The story is about finding a missing cat named Mildred.

name: Leximan
description: Do you like silly hats? Were you that one kid in class who broke reality? Are you eating nutritional slime right now? Embark on a brilliant adventure, using words and incompetence to solve bizarre problems. There are also hat goblins.

name: Dfiance
description: A multiplayer collectible card game set in a unique fantasy world where warring factions fight in a competition for resources on the battlefield.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Midnight Cat
description:
In "Rooftop Rascal: The Midnight Cat," you control a clever cat navigating city buildings' fire escape stairs to the rooftop.
The gameplay centres on jumps, and quick thinking.
Your goal is to climb as high as you can and reach the rooftop.

description: SNAP SNAP is a first-person psychological horror game with an oppressive atmosphere and intense gameplay. Use your camera to escape the monster and solve some puzzles. Use the charge sparingly, as the battery may run out and while it is charging at the station... you are defenseless. The game has four endings. Will you be able to open them all? Beautiful graphics, oppressive atmosphere and high-quality sound will help you fully immerse yourself in the terrifying world of SNAP SNAP.

name: Roadies: Unsung Heroes
description: Fast Paced Roadie "Simulator"

description: A horror game and walking simulator

description: Enter the dark corridors of your high school, the source of your psychotic episodes, and face your haunting fears embodied in shadows to try and find way to sanity.

name: Do You Know Kimchi?
description: by Heroes of the Strom , World has been Distorted. To Find Kimchi, the Player will Travel every world faces enemy, get powerful weapons Survive infinitely

description: Ninja: Shadow of the Dash is a fast-paced 2D speedrun platformer where you race against the clock to finish challenging levels as quickly as possible. With precise controls and high difficulty, only the best gamers can master it. Test your skills and aim for the fastest times!

description: Through maze after maze
