description: Immerse yourself in the world of car adventures, where you will feel the real adrenaline, getting behind the wheel of powerful cars. Take part in exciting races, improve your driving skills and master the art of drifting.

name: Collectibles!
description: Collectibles! — a true paradise for collectors! Collect unique items, share them with friends, and show off your achievements on the leaderboards!

name: Unreal Wukong
description: " Unreal WuKong" is an open-world action RPG based on the classic Chinese mythological novel, "Journey to the West." You will play as the Monkey King, Sun Wukong, embarking on a perilous and wondrous adventure to save the world by vanquishing demons that have traveled from the future.

name: Footage
description: FOOTAGE is a short bodycam shooter styled game witch uses unreal engine 5 latest technology to get stunning graphics and amazing gameplay. FOOTAGE has lot of action packed moments with multiple levels with different difficulty's to help make the game a longer and a more fun experience.

name: Legends of Kailrate
description: Help Kailrate defeat enemies as the waves progress. Be careful of bosses, they are sometimes dangerous!

name: Shoulders of Giants: Ultimate
description: Simultaneously control a sword-wielding robot and a gunslinging space frog in Shoulders of Giants, an explosively colourful sci-fi roguelike. Play alone, with a friend, or as part of a four-person team, cutting through waves of enemies on a quest to rescue the galaxy from the forces of Entropy!

name: 7 Meters Away: Oscar and the Cell of the Soul
description: "7 Meters Away. Óscar and the Cell of the Soul" is a point and click game in which you must help Óscar escape from a mysterious cell by solving various puzzles to discover why he has been imprisoned before it's too late.

name: Abuga Warp Zone
description: Play as Abuga through nearly 50 challenging but exciting levels. Warping through and making your way from start to finish. Be careful though, not all warps are there to help you and who knows what other obstacles lay ahead as you progress further. Enjoy your stay at the Warp Zones in StrangePlace!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Unholy Alliance
description: Summoned by blood and born in corruption, a wicked new ally can join the holy Lamb in LOCAL CO-OP! Crusade through dungeons, slay heretics, build your cult, and seek new powers together... But that's not all!

name: Pickup Point Simulator
description: Become an entrepreneur and develop your retail outlet. Order goods and place them in the warehouse, give orders to customers by scanning QR-code, design and expand your premises, hire employees and learn new skills!

name: Late Night Hunger
description: Enter a quiet town where Alex, a 9-year-old boy, lives a normal life. But when the clock strikes midnight, his house turns into a place of mystery and fear. Dark hallways, hidden rooms, and strange shadows transform his familiar home into a creepy adventure.

name: EA Sports Madden NFL 25: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Forgotten Skies
description: Discover the mysteries of Forgotten Skies, a fun platforming adventure where ancient secrets and hidden dangers await in this captivating adventure game. Forgotten Skies is a hilarious 3D Platform-Adventure developed and published by Chrysalis Interactive.

name: K-Pop Academy
description: Get ready to embark on a dazzling journey in the world of K-Pop Academy, where your dream of building the ultimate K-pop sensation comes true! Immerse yourself in the charming world of adorable idols, where you take charge of their daily lives and guide them to stardom.

name: Codename: Ocean Keeper
description: The entire underwater world will be hunting you. Find caves and dig tunnels to obtain valuable resources to upgrade your mech. Combine a vast array of weapons and create your unique build that will allow you to last as long as possible and unravel the mysteries of the ocean.

name: Incremental Island
description: Build and expand a vibrant civilization on a procedurally generated island

name: Izolated
description:
iZolated is a post-apocalyptic world with procedurally generated locations affected by the Spoils, where in order to survive you have to create food, equipment, weapons and even build your own shelter from improvised items!

Travel through the procedurally generated forest, get resources, explore new locations, evolve to get out of the forest enveloped by the spoil.

name: Choo-Choose
description: So, have you ever heard of the Trolley Problem? Do you know the price of the choices you make? How far are you ready to go to act according to your values? Will you sacrifice a life of the other to hold the moral high ground?

name: Ultimate Monkey Race
description: Ultimate Monkey Race is multiplayer platformer where you build the level as you play. Place deadly traps and parcour your way to the finish line to score points.

name: SpiritScape
description: Team up, explore haunted realms, and banish spirits in this cooperative ghost-hunting experience. Uncover supernatural mysteries with friends in this strategic multiplayer game.

name: MWNeus
description: MWNeus is a sandbox focused on a single girl named Neus, who is your childhood friend.

name: Diari
description: Arise player, welcome to Diari! Explore the world of Ekrose with Aimacra, giving them insight as she traverses through platforming and puzzles to meet her friend Sirestias. Guided by intuition and emotion, you will shape Aimacra through her journey and how it all ends.

name: Spectral Climb
description: 3D Platformer with some basic combat, climb the rise, impress the outer Gods and transend

name: Bearnard
description: "Bearnard" is a captivating single-player adventure game where you step into the furry paws of Bearnard, a valiant archer-bear on a mission to reclaim a legendary bow and protect his beloved forest from threats. This journey takes players through diverse biomes, including dense forests, dark mines, snowy mountains, abandoned castles, and mysterious dungeons, each presenting unique challenges and enemies. The game features a core turn-based battle system where strategic card use is essential for victory. Mastering tactical combat aspects, players will rely on archery as their primary weapon. Collecting and strategically deploying a variety of cards, ranging from common to legendary, is crucial. These cards offer powers like healing, defense, and enemy control, enabling powerful combos. As players explore, battle opponents, and uncover secrets, they'll enhance their archery skills, expand their deck, and unlock the full potential of Bearnard's quest. Engage in this rich, story-driven experience, where wit and strategy pave the path to victory.

name: Sidecar Evolution 2024
description: The first ever true MMO sidecar racing game is here! Play with up to 39 friends!

name: Old School RPG
description: Old School RPG is a first-person fantasy turn-based role playing game. Create a party of adventurers and clear out dungeons and solve puzzles. Find and eliminate the source of evil that has come to your lands.

name: Operation: Polygon Storm
description: A fastpaced, military tug-of-war game with minimal micromanagement. Choose and deploy from a mix of specialized military units to overwhelm the enemy. Experiment with a huge variety of unit compositions, synergies, abilities, and upgrades to lead your army to victory!

name: X Invader
description: 'X Invader' is a roguelite game where you play a hacker infiltrating corporation servers. Join the 'Rinascita' group to uncover hidden secrets. Use colleagues' add-ons to defeat security codes.

name: A Crown of Thorns
description: A Cyberpunk visual novel in a post Apocalyptic world that is a cross between Sin City and Blade Runner. Based on the IP of the 3 time award nominated feature film script entitled “Blade n Blood” .

name: Nova Drift
description: Nova Drift distills the mechanical depth of an action RPG into classic arcade space combat. Control an endlessly evolving bio-mechanical ship, face legions of strange and deadly foes, and ride the wake of a dying star across the void.

name: Pokémon: Berserk
description:
The Awakening Phenomenon is a phenomenon we have recently discovered by using the power of the Berserk Gene found from different types of species of Pokémon.

It temporarily increases your stats in battle, although the phenomenon still has a couple of quirks so you may not want to use it all the time, or else your Pokémon may have some... Unfortunate side-effects.

name: Pokémon Covenant
description: A life of poor decisions has led you to this moment, the moment where you commit your greatest transgression. In the final moment, you are saved by a mysterious figure and given a chance at redemption. Can you, with your memories wiped and true goal unclear, fulfil the terms of your unbreakable covenant and be born anew? You must traverse the ethereal land of Varia and overcome the seven Vices that represent the aspects of your shattered heart, endeavoring to collect the mementoes along the way that will allow you to piece together your forgotten past.​

name: Lost Paradise of Karuta
description:
"The one who came to meet me as I attempted suicide was a pure white grim reaper."

"A visual novel ensemble drama gift for those who find living in the present difficult."

A visual novel game themed around life and the human psyche, dedicated to those struggling to live in today's challenging times. This is a story searching for the answer to why we live.

name: Super Mario 64: Royal Legacy - Definitive Edition
description:
Super Mario 64: Royal Legacy - Definitive Edition is a rom hack for Super Mario 64 made by aglab2, Nobbie and StunningCactus, and it is a remake of the original SM64 Royal Legacy made by StunningCactus.

It is made for fans of SM64 Sapphire who have already mastered everything the Vanilla game has to offer.

The Game includes 4 original worlds, a new hub world, a new Bowser Stage and original music.

name: Thirty Monsters Challenge 2: Thirty Aliens
description: A sequel to the original 30MC, the task was simple: create a map with 30 monsters in it. This set of 36 cl21 maps features work by a number of talented community map designers and contains some custom assets on top of the colorful Ancient Aliens texture pack!

name: Room 202
description: While traveling, you get tired and decide to stop at a hotel. Little do you know who - or what - else has checked in.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Extended Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Bitter
description: This game is a vibrant puzzle game that combines upbeat background music with a simple yet engaging gameplay mechanism.

name: Flame
description: This game is a retro pixel-style platformer that plays much like the classic Mario series.

name: Blubber
description: This game is a mechanically-styled flying hazard avoidance game

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Berlin
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Berlin landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Moonshot
description: Blast off in Project Moonshot: The Addictive Rocket Adventure You Can't Put Down!

name: TimeKeeper
description: This is an idle casual game where you can shake the tree pole again when the number on the time board turns green and shows "0" to drop fruits from the tree. When you can shake the pole again, you'll find that several days have passed.

name: Beatrect
description: Introducing Beatrectthe Rhythm Action Game for music lovers and note-slashers both old and new!Slash the notes without complicated rules. Experience a whole new lay-tracing based graphic.

name: The Walls Still Stand
description: Step into the eerie Kowloon Walled City in "The Walls Still Stand", an indie horror walking simulator. Complete daily tasks, uncover dark secrets, and explore with 3D spatial sound. Think critically to unlock all six endings in this 1-2 hour journey. Can you escape the city's grip?

name: University Days: Season 1
description: Step into the shoes of a Student at an all-but-ordinary University, where there seems to never be a dull day with hot women around every corner. Just so happens that you could just be the most wanted guy at this University... Who will you fall for?.. And who will fall for you?

name: Device Doctor Simulator 2024
description: Device Doctor Simulator 2024 offers an interactive and detailed simulation experience of becoming a technology repair expert. In this unique simulation, dive into the complex world of various digital devices, including smartphones, tablets, and smartwatches.

name: The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure
description: The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure is a game where you help Verbum save a library from creatures that threaten the interdimensional knowledge books. Overcome levels in a world made of blocks and explore unimaginable worlds to gather the energy necessary to purify them.

name: DCS World: UH-1H Peacekeeper Lebanon Campaign by Flying Cyking
description:
Lebanon, September 2006.
It has been four weeks since the end of the second Lebanon war (July War). UN Forces have been deployed to ensure the ceasefire agreement and stabilize the southern regions of Lebanon.

name: DCS World: CH-47F
description: The Boeing CH-47F Chinook fondly referred to as 'The Hook' by US military personnel, stands today as the premier multi-mission rotary wing aircraft in use with the US Army, US Army Reserve, National Guard and 20 other nations including Canada, the United Kingdom, Netherlands, Japan, Italy, Greece, Spain, South Korea, Australia, Türkiye, India and the United Arab Emirates. Embodying a unique tandem rotor design this massive helicopter excels in all its roles, including cargo and troop transportation, sling load operations, search and rescue, casualty evacuation, special operations, and humanitarian assistance in disaster scenarios.

name: Martian Supermarket Sim
description: Embark on an unprecedented retail adventure with "Martian Supermarket Sim," where you spearhead the first supermarket venture on the dusty red plains of Mars, within the bustling colony of New Olympus. This is more than a business—it’s a cornerstone of a new civilization.

name: P Fit
description:
P Fit is a puzzle game in which the player has to match the top and bottom pieces to move to the next level.

Both walls move slowly towards each other, if they touch you will have to start all over again. Your goal as a player is to last as long as possible.

name: Pixicharm: Fit Frog's Feast
description: Help a lively frog collect tasty fruits while avoiding hazards. Use simple left and right controls to gather nutritious treats and enjoy a fun, stress-free experience with no lives to lose or defeats to worry about!

The goal is to avoid obstacles and collect as many points as possible. As player accumulates higher scores, the game speeds up, increasing the difficulty. Navigate through the challenging environment and aim for the highest score while avoiding hazards.

A demon who claims to be an "Exile" blocks your apartment, demanding you to escape within the stipulated time, otherwise, you will face certain death. But will the demon really keep his promise? What is the demon's purpose after all?

description:
A brand-new old adventure!
Relive the classic adventure gamebook Sonic vs. Zonik, now in full digital glory!
Everything is recorded by the game! No more pencil and paper - enjoy the adventure without lifting a finger!
Progress saves automatically, so come back and resume your game as you please!
Never get lost again with the included Cheat Sheet, a detailed guide to every section in the game!
Toggle a variety of options to customize your experience and foil Robotnik's diabolical traps!
Features authentic Sega Genesis music to suit the mood of each location!

name: Kawaii Slime
description: An idle/clicker game where the player collects slime inventory items over time. Slimes can vary from size, color, shape, and rarity. Some limited slimes maybe released during certain times of the year for a short time so be sure to stay alert for new announcements.

name: Super Dassalo Land
description: A Platformer Prequel to Tommy Dassalo's 'Scam Artist'

name: Hentai Dating Stories: Brazil - Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Solitaire: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fashion Friends: Super Version
description: Sin descripción

name: World War II: Airplanes Battle
description: Conquer the Skies, Change History.

name: Outbreak: Detective Collection
description: Lost alone in a zombie infested mansion in the woods...

name: FrogFlop
description: In Floppy's Great Leap, you play as Floppy the frog, aiming to reach the highest peak. Jump and climb through challenging levels in this 2D pixel art adventure. Reach the summit to make your wish, but be careful—one wrong move and you could find yourself back at the bottom!

name: PS!Outertale
description: Project Spacetime, or PS!Outertale for short, is a take on Outertale by Mimi Pippinski (2mi127). It is set on a space station (the Outpost) which the monsters were banished to after their home planet was destroyed.

name: Outertale: Project Spacetime
description: Project Spacetime is my take on Outertale by 2mi127. Main character designs are borrowed, but the music, tilesets, battle sprites, and backstory are new. If you're like me, and want to experience UNDERTALE for the first time again, this is for you.

name: Energy Lab
description:
ENERGY LAB!
In 30 episodes, can you escape this lab?
You can trigger the mechanisms with your energy orb,
Remember that some things need to be triggered if you want to get through!
Only this energy orb will not trigger anything!

name: Snazzy and Groovy in Crystal Town
description: Snazzy and Groovy in Crystal Town is a bite sized, story-focused RPG surrounding two cat friends and their relaxing holiday in a place called Crystal Town. However, something sinister brews beneath the surface... will you give the people of crystal town a hand? Or give them the cold shoulder...

name: NTR Loop
description: This story is about Syrius and his girlfriend, Arlene, who are sent back in time to relieve their first adventure. An offended and bored Witch will immensely enjoy corrupting this love story.

name: I Wanna Fuck My Mom's Best Friend
description: Sin descripción

name: Robot Female Hero Remastered
description: The evil SON has taken over the MULTITOWER and attacked the people of Apann with his army of CORRUPTED ROBOTS! And only Serena Robo, the Defender of Apann, and her new friends can save the day and stop the SON's evil plans! Many twists are along the way in: ROBOT FEMALE HERO REMASTERED!

name: Coloring Pixels: Oceania Pack
description: Oceania BookThis Oceania book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Images are of the amazing cultures from down under!Check out this whole ocean-based continent in pixel art!

name: Jinko
description: Jinko is a physics-based musical arcade game where balls fall to the rhythm, and your job is to keep them up! Fight against gravity and time across a variety of unique songs and levels, or challenge yourself in the arcade mode to see how your best score stacks up on the global leaderboard.

name: KnightLight
description: A 2D puzzle-platformer where you light your way through the darkness. Play as the Light, exploring an abandoned civilization where you find a suit of armor that seems to have magical properties. Suit up using the powers of the suit to channel your light magic to see what this strange place hides.

name: PhobLack
description: "I'm here to stay. But if I don't assert my presence, no one will notice me." PhobLack is a horror adventure game in which you explore a haunted ruin. In a dark and enclosed mansion, restore the ability to communicate with the outside world in order to call for rescue.

name: Grave Space
description: Pilot through 10 progressive levels in this SNES style retro side scroller/bullet hell.

name: Barro 2024
description: Jumping is back!

name: Under the Blue Horizon
description: "Under the Blue Horizon" is an idle simulation game. Play while performing other tasks on your computer! Place your own aquarium anywhere on your screen, coexisting with your work, games, and more!

name: A Good Cat and The Graduate Life
description: Playing as a good cat, helping your master get over the struggle!

name: Kill Kill Kill Kill
description: KILL KILL KILL KILL - Intense arena shooter featuring a space warrior annihilating invaders from the distant cosmos. You're the last line of defense against their domination. Destroy them with diverse weapons, tearing through hordes of enemies.

name: University Tycoon: The College Management Simulator
description: Build and manage a University, with realistic curriculum scheduling, reputation system, and a multiple building campus

name: Stock Stack
description: "Stock Stack" is a simple game that simulates stock investment and it can be used to educate or compete with your friend Maybe whoever know about investment market more can be a winner because this game reflects the working principles of the real stock market. (not at all!)

name: Boom Robots
description: Join the fray and let the battles begin - up to 8 players in local multiplayer

name: Escape From the Pharaoh's Tomb
description: Escaping from each challenging room involves solving a puzzle where you’ll aim a magic beam of light to open a magical locked door. You’ll have to contend with dangerous enemies, avoid outlandish traps, and even out-maneuver the chamber walls closing in.

name: Aero Battle Royale
description: Dominate the skies in breathtaking environments, battling opponents and mastering high-speed flight. Utilize your weapons and piloting skills to be the last pilot soaring!

name: Ambulance Driver
description: Welcome to "Ambulance Driver," where every second counts and speed is your lifeline.

name: Magic Wand
description: This is a crazy racing game!

name: Supermarket Together
description: The multiplayer supermarket has arrived to your neighbourhood for free! Stock your shop space, unlock perks and franchises, hire employees or chase those pesky shoplifters. The more players, the more action!

name: BirdLingo: A birdsong learning game
description: Welcome to BirdLingo, a game designed for honing your bird song recognition skills. Immerse yourself in a cute and relaxing atmosphere as you learn the songs of the 44 most common birds in Europe.

name: Bid Battle: Auction War Simulator Storage Hunter
description: Outbid, Explore, Profit! Unearth the treasures of the auction world!

name: Fisher Guy
description: Fisher Guy - A game with a top view, where the player as a fisherman must catch fish and deliver it to the chef's bucket, but only he will be hampered by eco-activists who are against your fishing, they have taken over all the islands!

name: Greedy Bee
description: Greedy Bee - The game is a mix of clicker and platformer genre, the player will have to maneuver and calculate his actions, dodge traps and get the necessary bonuses for the passage of 40+ levels.

name: Desert Racer
description: Are you a good driver? A game to test your reaction speed. The player controls a car, the speed of which is gradually increasing. It is necessary to turn and collect gasoline cans in time.

name: Sheep Adventure
description: Control a cute sheep in this 3D arcade game and help it reach the safe green meadow, avoiding passing cars and dangerous lakes. Go through exciting levels of increasing difficulty, testing your reaction skills and agility. Are you ready to become the hero of this exciting adventure?

name: Commandos Dreams
description: Dive into a world of challenges with 'Commandos Dreams'! This demanding 2D arcade game puts you in control of a jetpack, requiring you to navigate meticulously and push your skills and reaction time to the limit.

name: Tokyo Coffee: Grinding in the Pandemic
description: Remembering the COVID-19 pandemic... It started in the year 2020. The events that unfolded in a cafe in Tokyo are now a nostalgic memory. Sit back, brew yourself a hot cup of coffee (or tea), and immerse yourself in the stories of the staff and different customers who visited the cafe.

name: PinDrop
description: In Pin Drop, players explore a dark world to find the true door. The journey is full of tension as they move through creepy settings while avoiding danger. Random objects can spawn and create noises, which can wake up zombies.

name: KillerNight
description: Killer Night is a psychological survival thriller where a group of death row inmates face extreme trials in an isolated mansion to gain freedom. Among them lies a ruthless killer. Will you be able to discover the killer's identity before it's too late?

name: Tehawar Puzzle!
description: Tehawar Puzzle! is a simple, relaxing jigsaw puzzle game with original gameplay mechanics. 90 high-quality images to unlock, mostly featuring beautiful women in bikinis in fantasy settings (all images are SFW).

name: Pirate Combat Trainer
description: You command a small sailing vessel. Take on endless waves of enemy pirate ships as you battle to keep your ship alive. Maintain a tactical advantage as you attempt to survive on the high seas. Destroy as many ships as you can to achieve a highscore to prove your naval aptitude.

name: Glowie Rammer
description: The glowies are out to get you! You just run them over, that's what you do. Fast-paced racing meets spine-chilling horror. In this endless runner, you are not just racing against time but also against the ones who glow in the dark.

name: DinoTribe
description: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Forgotten Bunker 1939
description: step into the boots of Private Jacob, an American soldier caught in the fury of a World War II bombing raid. Desperately seeking refuge, Jacob stumbles upon a terrifying mysterious bunker, which turns out to be a demonic time portal.

name: Welcome to Dustown
description: Welcome to Dustown is a 4-player cooperative horror game. Play as field scientists exploring vast fields of labyrinthine corn, collecting samples and evidence on behalf of a mysterious corporation. Just make sure you don't get killed at the crossroads.

name: Vikings Pinball
description: Fun pinball style battles. Attack the military camps of the holy Roman Empire and crush the legionaries. Choose the right trajectories to inflict as much damage as possible. Shoot down enemies, blow up barrels and collect coins. Free the map from these lazybones!

name: God of Fortune
description: Every time we tap in the virtual world, a string of numbers full of hope and wealth will follow. Every click in the virtual world is a challenge and breakthrough in real life. Every click is a knock on the soul; every God of Wealth Coin is hope for the future.

name: Click On Cups Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ cups in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Hard

name: SIM: Simple Idle Miner
description: Gather resources to help the "important persons" to escape from the planet. A small and simple clicker game. Some would call it an idler. But how idle can you get, clicking all these upgrades. Also the fox doesn't want you to idle. Go get to work!

name: I Commissioned Some Ladybugs 4
description: I paid more artists to hide ladybugs and aphids in 20 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Bowling In A Skate Park
description: Analyze the playfield, find the best trajectory, pick the right time and go for a strike hit.

name: GraveyardGambit
description: GraveyardGambit is an exciting 3D first-person game where you loot graves as a grave robber, evade guards, and buy upgrades. Experience a dark atmosphere, random events, and various weather scenarios.

name: Omega No Sunshine 2
description:
Omega No Sunshine , second game of the title, is an arcade collecthation game where players have to travel through different places in order to collect sun rings. Humanity is destroying their own world and an another time, it need someone able to collect them all and restore the sun to shine again.

This title was delisted and later republished in 2025 as a new release and self-published by Galoxyum with ongoing updates and features.

name: Sand In a Box
description: Sand in a Box is a 'falling sand' game that simulates thermal flow, electricity, radioactive decay, and gravity. Create art, experiment with physics, and craft your own simulation rules with user-friendly mod support!

name: A Room With a Ghost Girl
description: Terau Mare is a shy girl moves to Tokyo to go to university, and her new house, Hakusan-so, is like an abandoned. As soon as she enters the room, Mare meets a ghost girl, Furuzaki Yuika. Yuika says, "I'm going to kick you out of here soon." But...

name: One more!
description: Drink a mug is a clicker game where you drink a mug.

name: Flashlight Sim
description: A flashlight-based simulation game with various elements such as combat and puzzles which will test your sense of direction and your worthiness. The best simulation out there! Guaranteed to change your life as well as those around you!

name: The Bathhouse Restored Edition
description: The Bathhouse | 地獄銭湯 Remake is a Japanese horror game that revolves around working at a bathhouse. A complete revamp of the original bathhouse.

name: Horror In Hongdae
description: Solve the mystery of the disappearance of a real estate tycoon. This adventure/visual novel game will unveil the secrets hidden behind the facades of a neighborhood in Seoul, with some being frightening and others holding pleasant surprises.
